explanation: The stage direction 'Il les met en termes de combattre.' translates to 'He puts them in terms of fighting.' This clearly indicates a violent action, which falls under the definition of the 'aggression' category. The examples in this category include 'Il prend Hector à la cravate.' and 'Là ils se battent.', which are similar in nature to the given stage direction.
stgdir: Il les met en termes de combattre.
